description: A political arena where the forest itself speaks, through the use of artificial intelligence. Join the forest’s inhabitants as they debate deforestation, rewilding, and the fate of their shared home.

aboutText.about:
What would an ancient pine say about deforestation? How would fishes react to a hydropower plant? Can AI embody the wisdom of a river, a tree, or a reindeer herd?

Through AI, nonhuman entities—trees, fungi, rivers, and animals—gather to deliberate the fate of their shared home. Their voices are shaped by a mix of knowledge systems, including traditional and Indigenous worldviews, ecological science, and data. They are drawn from interviews and conversations with people living in and caring for the Vindelälven-Juhttátahkka biosphere reserve—reindeer herders, forest owners, rewilding organizations, pollinator experts, and cultural workers—each with a deep connection to the land.

Council of Forest functions as an forum where the forest’s inhabitants voice their needs and consider the impact of human activities like logging, rewilding, and climate shifts. Humans are invited to listen, ask questions, and reflect. Each session concludes with a collective statement and a policy recommendation made by the forest. An experiment in ecological thinking and speculative design—exploring how technology can mediate between humans and the more-than-human world.

What does it mean to act in the forest’s best interest? Whose knowledge counts? And what happens when we take nonhuman voices seriously?

reset.title: Start over?
reset.default: This will start everything from the beginning.
reset.changeTopic: Changing topic will start everything from the beginning.
reset.lang:
It is not possible to change language in the middle of an ongoing meeting.
Do you want to start over from the beginning?

name.title: SAY SOMETHING
name.1: Do you want to adress the Council of Forest?
name.2: Please enter your name to raise a request to speak,
name.21: and then wait until you are given the floor by River, the moderator.
name.unique: name must be unique in the council

controls.wait: wait for your turn to speak

human.1: Type your question or start recording...
human.panelist: What does {{name}} have to say about this?

completed.title: Is that it?
completed.1: This meeting is starting to get long-winded,
completed.2: is it time to come to a conclusion?

disclaimer.1: This document was created by the Council of Forest, a political arena where the forest itself speaks, through the use of artificial intelligence. While every effort has been made to generate meaningful content, please note the following:
disclaimer.2: This document may contain misinformation, outdated details, propaganda, or bad ideas.
disclaimer.3: The discussions may provide useful insights and reflect diverse ethical positions but should not replace evidence-based research or deep contemplation.
disclaimer.4: Don't just chat about it—get up and take action!
disclaimer.5: Council of Forest is an initiative by art & design collective
disclaimer.6: which has received funding from Vinnova
